code: var XDate=require('xdate');function padNumber(n){if(n<10){return'0'+n;}return n;}function xdateToData(d){var dateString=toMarkingFormat(d);return{year:d.getFullYear(),month:d.getMonth()+1,day:d.getDate(),timestamp:XDate(dateString,true).getTime(),dateString:dateString};}function parseDate(d){if(!d){return;}else if(d.timestamp){return XDate(d.timestamp,true);}else if(d instanceof XDate){return XDate(toMarkingFormat(d),true);}else if(d.getTime){var dateString=d.getFullYear()+'-'+padNumber(d.getMonth()+1)+'-'+padNumber(d.getDate());return XDate(dateString,true);}else if(d.year){var _dateString=d.year+'-'+padNumber(d.month)+'-'+padNumber(d.day);return XDate(_dateString,true);}else if(d){return XDate(d,true);}}function toMarkingFormat(d){return d instanceof XDate&&d.toString('yyyy-MM-dd');}module.exports={xdateToData:xdateToData,parseDate:parseDate,toMarkingFormat:toMarkingFormat};
